H0.text: Camp in the woods is a way that everyone can help with conservation efforts.

H1.text: Use biodegradable materials is a way that everyone can help with conservation efforts.

H2.text: Visiting a landfill is a way that everyone can help with conservation efforts.

H3.text: Using disposable plates is a way that everyone can help with conservation efforts.

A4.text: When a compostable product is thrown out as opposed to composted and sent to a landfill, these inventions and efforts are wasted.

A5.text: Biodegradable material is capable of decomposing without an oxygen source (anaerobically) into carbon dioxide, water, and biomass, but the timeline is not very specifically defined.
